title: Operation: E-Commerce Infiltration
subtitle: The Great Digital Marketplace Heist
description: Penetrated legacy e-commerce fortress and extracted 40% conversion rate improvement

Implemented AI-powered recommendation engine and advanced search capabilities, resulting in dramatic performance improvements and user satisfaction.

Extracted customer insights leading to 40% conversion improvement
